page.title: 02ESTON UNDER NAB
page.content: {Housing Estate:}All the houses are private and are semi-detached and detached.Most of the houses are new and have open front gardens. {The Grange:}The Grange is owned by Priest Furnaces.It is used for offices.It looks onto the housing estate which is Meadowgate, Highgate, Wychgate and Oldgate. {The Parkway}(A174):-The Parkway is on an embankment.It has a subway and a footbridge. {The Nab:}It is 240 metres above sea level. It is an old monument. There is a dig going on to find a stone-age fort. Just near is an old quarry which is now disused. {The Works:}The Works used to be old mine houses. It is built of sandstone (herring bone). It sells cement,wood and nails and other building materials and woods.
